review.author: DevOps
findings: L1: _withReadTransaction uses deferred BEGIN — shared read locks only, no write lock risk
All 7 SELECT chain groups wrapped in single transaction — snapshot-consistent reads guaranteed
ROLLBACK on error with inner try/catch — no leaked transactions possible
No nested transaction issues — inner helper methods use direct prepared statements
No deadlock risk — deferred transactions + single-threaded Node.js + synchronous better-sqlite3
Test coverage: success path (BEGIN→COMMIT) + error path (BEGIN→ROLLBACK)

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
